p: This experiment was divided into the control group, RSV group and RSV + POLD1-OE group. The protein was extracted 24Â h following RSV treatment of the MDA-MB-231 cells. The protein expression levels of POLD1, PARP1, Cleaved-PARP1, PCNA, BCLl-2, and Cleaved-caspase 3 were detected via WB. The POLD1 antibody was acquired from Abcam (USA), and GAPDH, Bcl-2, PCNA, PARP1, and cleared Caspase3 antibody were obtained from CST (United States).
